The developers have dumped a game they put so much time into making to let it just fall out over years. They need to fix the ranking system to kinda be like Valorants and they would get more people back into the game. You make so much money off skins that people unbox that you cant even have the decency to fix your game you "take pride in." You even add a battle pass to copy every other game to make yourself even more money just to be shitty developers. FIX YOUR GAME!
